body.name: OxiClean Laundry & Home Sanitizer for Laundry, Kitchen, Bath, Carpet & Upholstery, 2.5 Lbs
deliveryMessages: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.

features: Includes: One 2.5 lb container of OxiClean Laundry & Home Sanitizer to help you work your magic on germs, odors and stains
Home, Laundry and Clothing Sanitizer: Kills 99.9% of bacteria and viruses when used as directed
3 in 1 Laundry Cleaner: Features 3 in 1 power to remove germs, odors and stains to keep your laundry, kitchen, bath, carpet and upholstery sparkling fresh
Color-Safe: Easy to use odor and stain remover is gentle on fabrics and colors
Child-Resistant Packaging: Open this fabric sanitizer by squeezing the tabs on the lid and turning; When you're done, close tightly and store securely out of reach of children
body.description: Work your magic on germs, odors and stains with OxiClean Laundry and Home Sanitizer. This laundry additive kills 99.9% of bacteria and viruses when used as directed. The oxygen-based formula cleans and sanitizes, while being gentle. In the washer, this OxiClean Laundry and Home Sanitizer works with your regular laundry detergent to get your clothes extra clean. Your one-stop-shop for sanitization, use OxiClean Laundry & Home Sanitizer around the home to clean and sanitize laundry, carpets, couches, tile and more. OxiClean offers a wide array of products to fit all your stain removal needs. The OxiClean family has grown to include stain removers, pretreaters, laundry sanitizers, and much more!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hard Non-Porous Surfaces and Soft Surfaces, Carpets & Fabrics Hard Non-Porous Surfaces To Disinfect: Pre-clean surface. Fill scoop to the top twice (269.4g) and add to 1 gallon of water. Apply until visibly wet. Let stand 10 minutes for bacteria and 5 minutes for viruses.† Wipe clean.* To Prevent Mold & Mildew: Fill scoop to the top twice (269.4g) and add to 1 gallon of water. Apply until visibly wet. Air dry. Repeat every 7 days.* Soft Surfaces, Carpets & Fabrics To Spot Sanitize Soft Surfaces & Carpet: Fill scoop to the top twice (269.4g) and add to 1 gallon of water. Saturate surface until it is visibly wet. For carpet scrub with moderate pressure for 30 seconds. Let stand 5 minutes. Allow to air dry or blot with a cloth or sponge.* To Prevent Mold & Mildew: Fill scoop to the top twice (269.4g) and add to 1 gallon of water. Saturate surface until visibly wet. Air dry. Repeat every 28 days.* * When used as directed. EPA Registration number 10772-25, approval date 07/21/2020 Laundry Pre-Soak To Disinfect Laundry by Pre-Soaking: To Kill Bacteria, Fungi & Viruses†: Fill scoop to the top once (134.7g) and add one gallon of water. Immerse laundry for 15 minutes for bacteria and virus†, or 30 minutes for fungi prior to starting wash cycle.*, □ Standard Machines To Sanitize Laundry in Standard: Fill scoop to the top once (134.7g) BEFORE adding laundry. Add detergent as directed. Wash 18 minutes in hot water.◊ For Laundry Virucidal Action Against †Influenza A in Standard: Fill scoop to the top once (134.7g) BEFORE adding laundry. Add detergent as directed. Wash 18 minutes in hot water. High Efficiency Machines To Disinfect viruses in HE: Fill scoop to the top once (134.7g) BEFORE adding laundry. Add detergent as directed. Wash 15 minutes in warm water. Δ To Sanitize Laundry in HE: Fill scoop to the top twice (269.4g) BEFORE adding laundry. Add detergent as directed. Wash 15 minutes in warm water.◊ To Disinfect Bacteria in HE: Fill scoop to the top twice (269.4g) BEFORE adding laundry. Add detergent as directed. Wash 16 minutes in hot water.◊ Hard Non-Porous Surfaces and Soft Surfaces, Carpets & Fabrics Laundry Pre-Soak Standard Machines High Efficiency Machines

* Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Salmonella enterica, Staphylococcus aureus, Klebsiella pneumoniae, Escherichia coli 0157:H7. ††Rhinovirus, †Influenza A, †Herpes Simplex Virus Type 1, †Rotavirus. □Trichophyton interdigitale, ◊Staphylococcus aureus, Klebsiella pneumoniae. Δ †Rhinovirus, †Influenza A, †Human Coronavirus When used as directed - EPA Registration number 10772-25, approval date 07/21/2020.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unscented Powerhouse for Clean Living
reviews.reviewText: The OxiClean Laundry & Home Sanitizer into my household routine, I'm compelled to share its exceptional features. This 2.5 lbs powerhouse is unscented, making it a versatile and practical addition to my laundry, kitchen, bath, carpet, and upholstery care. The unscented formula allows for seamless pairing with scent beads, enabling a customizable and refreshing laundry experience. The value for money is undeniable, with two convenient tubes that make dispensing and measuring a breeze. Not only is it easy to use in regular laundry cycles, but it also emerges as a stellar stain remover when applied directly to soiled areas. The OxiClean Laundry & Home Sanitizer stands as a great investment for those seeking a reliable, unscented, and multifunctional cleaning solution that delivers on its promise of cleanliness and freshness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easiest sanitizer I have ever used. WILL buy this again!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a few of these containers on sale a few months ago. Not sure why, but I hadn't tried it until this past weekend. I ended up using it on all 6 bedding and towel loads. I LOVE that is dissolves easily and rinses easily and creates no bubbles that require extra rinsing. There is not much of a scent to it, but everything smells clean and fresh when done. Best part is that I don't have to wait until the rinse cycle and then pause the machine like other products. Arm & Hammer got it right with this product! EASY. Add it in at the beginning of the cycle with your detergent and let it go do it's thing.About the container....I don't know why so many people have a problem with it. It is secure so nothing will come out from shipping. To open it, you squeeze the tabs toward each other and turn counter clockwise (left)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great,works well,smells nice,never had a problem with this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Been sun this since COVID and it’s great! Also super helpful for cleaning linens when the little ones have an accident, it takes the odor right out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like the product but....
reviews.reviewText: I've always liked this product however, this container was hard to open! I had to get my friend to open it. The child proof cap is almost adult proof!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I cannot be without this
reviews.reviewText: As a pharmacist, I feel like I am around a lot of germs on a constant basis. Because of this, I wash every single load of mine with. This OxiClean disinfectant. It makes me feel better about not bringing things back to my family that can cause them to be ill. This is so easy because it is a powder that can be added at the beginning of the wash it has no scent and works well with detergent and downy unstoppables.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean and fresh every time!
reviews.reviewText: This is our go-to stain remover and sanitizer! Never leaves residue or discoloration like some other stain fighters or washing machine sanitizing powders. After years of use this has definitely become a staple in our laundry room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used a little of this Oxi clean in my carpet cleaner and it left the carpet smelling fresh. It works well.
